org.apache.juneau.jena

Class RdfParserContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContext
        • org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserContext
          • org.apache.juneau.jena.RdfParserContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RdfCommonContext

    public final class RdfParserContext
extends ParserContext
implements RdfCommonContext
    Configurable properties on the RdfParser class.

    Context properties are set by calling PropertyStore.setProperty(String, Object) on the property store passed into the constructor.

    See PropertyStore for more information about context properties.

    Configurable properties inherited by the RDF parsers
    • BeanContext - Properties associated with handling beans on serializers and parsers.
      • ParserContext - Configurable properties common to all parsers.
        • RdfCommonContext - Configurable properties common to the RDF serializers and parsers.

    • Field Detail

      • RDF_trimWhitespace

        public static final String RDF_trimWhitespace
        Configuration property: Trim whitespace from text elements.

        • Name: "RdfParser.trimWhitespace"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false
        • Session-overridable: true

        If true, whitespace in text elements will be automatically trimmed.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
